name: Dark Knight 2D Character
description:
NOW FREE UNDER CC0  : You can copy, modify, distribute and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission.

Sprites and unity package file included

Realistic 2D character rendered from 3d models and animations for a seamless experience. All 37 textures are a power of 2 and have been sliced to make 37 animation clips.

WEBGL DEMO | VIDEO DEMO

Note: This only includes sprites that have been sliced and made into animations, no script or fully linked controller is included. Might be added in a future version.
